name: Sol Gravitas
description:
Play against your friends and be the first one to reach the finish! Each course has different paths to the finish, choose wisely... Use gravity to your advantage!

  • Different paths to the finish
  • Casual racing experience
  • Multiplayer

Sol Gravitas team: 

  • Dylan Millian
  • Briek Keters
  • Viktor Colpaert
  • Lucas Van Baeveghem
